spectrumÂ¶

spectrum contains functions and classes for processing spectral data.

Methods

discretize(func_dNdE, eng) Discretizes a continuous function.
get_bin_bound(eng) Returns the bin boundary of an abscissa.
rebin_N_arr(N_arr, in_eng, out_eng) Rebins an array of particle number with fixed energy.

Classes

Spectrum(eng, dNdE[, rs]) Structure for photon and electron spectra with log-binning in energy.

Exceptions

LogBinError Exception when something is not log-binned.
